'''Fraser Kerr''' ([[25 February|February 25]], [[1931]]-[[19 March|March 19]], [[2000]]) was a Scottish actor. He provided the voice for [[Saruman|Saruman the White]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]].
